data.prayer: Lord, please give the 17,596 believers in the county of Kaushambi the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kaushambi, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kaushambi, Uttar Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kaushambi, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, cause the 17,596 believers in Kaushambi to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,596 believers in Kaushambi, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Lakhera people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Lakhera people know you.
Lord, make the 17,596 believers in Kaushambi to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,582,004 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,599,600 people live in the county of Kaushambi. Please, give them 319 new simple churches this year.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kaushambi, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,599,600.

We estimate Kaushambi has 17,596 people who might know Jesus, 19,408 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,562,596 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Kaushambi, Uttar Pradesh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
